column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " I got you ! "
#Text=Kuvira says : " Congratulations on all of your hard work .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Probably something minor .
#Text=I should be able to find the problem .
#Text=The distributor pin is gone .
#Text=I swear I locked it in place yesterday .
#Text=There 's no way it could have just fallen out .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " And this could cause the entire weapon to fail ?
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " It could cause it to explode .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " What do you know about this ?
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " Nothing .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " You swore your loyalty to me and I gave you a chance at greatness .
#Text=This is how you repay me ?!
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " You 're a monster .
#Text=I regret nothing .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Chain her up in the target town .
#Text=She can see how the weapon works up close and personal .
#Text=" Opal says : " Oh , no .
#Text="
